perturbation.original_text: (v)	During the Term and during the sell-off period, MusclePharm shall make royalty payments in U.S. dollars for the respective quarters ending on the last day of September, December, March and June (each, a “Royalty Period”) within thirty (30) days from the end of each quarterly period.
